import React, { Fragment, useState } from 'react' const Register = () => { const [FormData, setFormData] = useState({ name: '', email: '', password: '', password2: '' }); const { name, email, password, password2 } = FormData; //name, email, passwords are pull out of FormData return (

This site uses Gravatar so if you want a profile image, use a Gravatar email

) }; export default Register;
